nextgen.core.model
Class ScanStatisticDataAlignmentModel

java.lang.Object
  nextgen.core.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCollection<Alignment>
      nextgen.core.model.AlignmentModel
          nextgen.core.model.ScanStatisticDataAlignmentModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnnotationCollection<Alignment>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TranscriptomeSpaceAlignmentModel
public class ScanStatisticDataAlignmentModel
extends AlignmentModel

Author:
engreitz Analysis module for calculating scan statistics on a collection of reads. This is a hold-over class from the move to a generic scoring function for the DataAlignmentModel, and makes two main changes to the DataAlignmentModel: it makes a PEBAM by default, and uses the ScanStatisticScore analysis module instead of the CountScore analysis module. TODO maybe should implement PeakCaller instead of extending DataAlignmentModel
